sentence.Network_en: Having the right equipment at hand will be enormously helpful.

sentence.Network_cn: 我觉得她听起来像是一个真心真意地关爱和帮助别人的人。

sentence.Network_en: An A to Z of careers gives helpful information about courses.

entry.def: If you describe someone as helpful, you mean that they help you in some way, such as doing part of your job for you or by giving you advice or information.

example.ex: The staff in the London office are helpful but only have limited information...
example.tran: 伦敦办事处的工作人员给予了帮助，但他们掌握的信息有限。

example.ex: James is a very helpful and cooperative lad...
example.tran: 詹姆斯是个肯帮忙、好合作的小伙子。

entry.tran: （信息、建议等）有帮助的，有用的
entry.def: If you describe information or advice as helpful, you mean that it is useful for you.

example.ex: The catalog includes helpful information on the different bike models available...
example.tran: 目录中包括了在售的各种型号自行车的有用信息。

example.ex: The following information may be helpful to readers.
example.tran: 下列信息可能对读者有用。

entry.tran: (事物）有助于改善局面的，有好处的
entry.def: Something that is helpful makes a situation more pleasant or more easy to tolerate.

example.ex: A predominantly liquid diet for a day or two may be helpful...
example.tran: 一两天里主要吃流质食物可能会有好处。

example.ex: It is often helpful to have your spouse in the room when major news is expected...
example.tran: 等待重大消息时最好有配偶在场。

means.word_mean: 1. providing assistance or serving a useful function

sentences.sentence: "a child who is helpful around the house can save the mother many steps"
"parents hope to raise children who are considerate and helpful to others"

Sentence.sentence: The ability to draw upon every available tool and insight—picked up from science, arts, and technology—to solve the problems of the future, and take advantage of the opportunities that present themselves, will be helpful to them and the United States.
I think your advice will be helpful to those just staring out in business.
Now, anything at all that you can remember would be extremely helpful to us.
find iPhones and iPods in class very helpful

means.word_mean: 给予帮助的, 有益的

sentences.en: Our teacher gave us a lot of helpful books in maths.
sentences.cn: 我们老师给了我们许多数学上有帮助的书。

jushi.english: It was a helpful thing to do.
The teacher gave us a lot of helpful books in maths.
jushi.chinese: 老师给了我们许多数学上有帮助的书。
她是位乐于助人的姑娘。
